banner.subtitle: Welcome to my website! Here you can discover my digital projects, the websites I have done and my skills.

AboutMe.TransformingIdeas: Transforming ideas into websites that inspire and perform
AboutMe.description: I’m Gabriela Aguilar, a passionate Frontend Developer with over 4 years of experience building fast, optimized, and visually engaging websites. I combine creativity, research, and technical precision to deliver digital solutions that truly represent each brand.
AboutMe.strategicDesc: Before writing a single line of code, I research the market, analyze competitors, and define a clear visual identity for the project — ensuring every website connects with its audience and stands out.
AboutMe.VisionDesc: I start by creating an approved Figma mockup, then move seamlessly into development using WordPress or custom code, delivering responsive and professional results.
AboutMe.SeoDesc: I don’t just build beautiful websites. I make sure they load fast, rank better, and provide a smooth user experience on any device.
AboutMe.personalizedDesc: Each client receives tailored attention, post-launch optimization, and updates to keep their site aligned with their goals.
AboutMe.4years: 4+ Years of Experience in Web Development

portfolio.FeaturedWorkDesc: A showcase of projects where creativity meets precision; some designed from concept to launch, others developed from client-provided designs, all built with performance and user experience in mind.

Testimonials.PeopleSay: What People Say About Working With Me
Testimonials.PeopleSayDesc: From clients to coworkers, here are some words from those who’ve experienced my work ethic, creativity, and commitment firsthand.
